üéØ Objectives #

  • Gain a clear understanding of text analysis and its significance in Elasticsearch.
  • Learn how tokens, analyzers, tokenizers, and token filters work together.
  • Understand the concept of the inverted index and its role in efficient searching.

üèóÔ∏è What is Text Analysis? #

In Elasticsearch, text analysis is the process of converting raw text into structured, searchable tokens for efficient indexing and querying. Rather than storing text as a single block, Elasticsearch breaks it down into components to enable partial matching and relevance scoring.
